content:
I'm most likely going to busy during meeting hours today, don't particularly have project questions right now

  • Is there any time that you're available before 12PM EST for meetings, because then I can keep continuing the meeting sessions which we would prefer. Else we can keep the current time and @Dhruv Jauhar or @azhng will attend

  • Status update: Resurrected all our ongoing work

  • Closure printing: Did a first prototype based on the initial proposal. PR for proposal updated with discussions from today. https://github.com/rust-lang/project-rfc-2229/pull/17. Should be able to finish implementation by end of the week
  • Inference variable capture types tuple: 180 tests fail right of now (including diagnostic messages). There might be some more feedback that needs to be applied from our discussions earlier.
  • Closure captures bridge: Old analysis works with the new bridge code without any significant duplication. Need to spend some time looking at the intermediate structure to ensure things look correct.
@Aman Arora yeah we can find an earlier slot, maybe on a different day
One question is whether it'd be useful to do a zoom meeting to go over e.g. inference variable capture or other things
I guess I'd like to know if there is a better way for me to support y'all

Yeah we can do another day of the week.

We can decide next week on the inference variable stuff, once we have spent some time investigating a bit more ourselves. If doesn't work out amongst us we can do discuss over zoom
